title: Helper Tools
content: A collection of helper scripts residing in the tools/ directory that make common tasks easier. The gh-create-issue.sh script creates GitHub issues in the SkogAI/lore repository with proper formatting and labels. The create-file.sh script safely creates files with automatic directory creation and overwrite protection. These tools embody the automation philosophy, abstracting complex operations into simple invocations.
summary: Shell scripts that simplify common repository tasks
